node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 23 日出現症狀，由檢疫中心送院，與個案 #2052、#2304、#2366 及 #2367 宗個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient has no travel history, developed symptoms on July 23, and was hospitalised from quarantine centre. Her case is epidemiologically related to those of patients #2052, #2304, #2366, and #2367.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者
